CUSBD_EpAuxBufferConfig_s Struct Reference
Dynamic Data Structures

#include <cusbd_structs_if.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t * bufferAddr

Detailed Description

Configuration of Auxiliary-overflow buffers for EP-OUT endpoints. This structure is software related.

Field Documentation

uint8_t* CUSBD_EpAuxBufferConfig_s::bufferAddr

Virtual address of auxiliary buffer for this endpoint

uint16_t CUSBD_EpAuxBufferConfig_s::bufferSize

Size of the auxiliary buffer in 32-bit-words
